alert.note: Alert for Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 4:52PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Seminole County through 515 PM EDT... At 452 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Donalsonville, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Donalsonville, Iron City, Seminole State Park, Steam Mill, Desser, Reynoldsville, Davis Park, Little Hope, Lela, Riverturn, Sharphagen, Donaldsonville A/P and Fairchild. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
